website_summaries.verdict: With a silicone gel gripper pad under each heel, these no-show socks rarely slip, making them a great choice for active people.
pros: The plunging cuff in these no-show socks makes them a good choice for pumps or ballet flats
Good heel fit, with added silicone grippers on each heel
Thicker than many no-show socks, providing extra cushioning and comfort
cons: Can be too tight around the toes, especially in pointed-toe heels

customer_reviews.title: Not low cut enough
customer_reviews.text: I bought these socks because the product photo shows the model's toes slightly showing. I have two pairs of flats that require very low cut liners and even though I wear a size 10, these completely cover my toes and don't make the cut for the flats I bought these for. That being said they feel like nice quality and I can wear them for other pairs of heels and flats, hence my 4-star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Cecil

customer_reviews.title: The good and the bad!
customer_reviews.text: These socks are cut so they don’t show over the shoes. I like the gel at the heel that keeps them in place. My only complaint and it is a significant one, is that the toes are too tight so they are uncomfortable to wear for very long. I wear a size 7 1/2 or 8 shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Actually Low-Profile!
customer_reviews.text: As silly as it sounds, I’ve had a really hard time finding no-show socks that 1) are actually no-show and 2) that stay up on your heel. These are just what I needed and I love the variety of colors. The back of the heel sometimes slightly shows with certain shoes (i have some slide-on tennis shoes this happens with) but you can adjust the sock to cover more of your toes so this doesn’t happen. There is a good sized grip on the heel so they have stayed up for me all day. I’ve only used these in slip on sneakers such as vans and boat shoes so i can’t speak to other flats.
customer_reviews.author: A. Marie

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I needed socks for my flats that hurt the back of my feet. These socks were perfect and made my shoes so comfortable. They did show a tiny bit but that wasn't an issue for me. My socks did match my shoe color. These socks didn't slide down at all since they have grip to them, which I can't feel. I love that they come with different colors and very comfy. I wear a 9 1/2 shoe and these were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: C. Stalnaker

customer_reviews.title: very good low cut sock
customer_reviews.text: These low cut socks fit very well under flats that are cut lower down the front of the foot. There is a very slight show but it is minimal around the edge of the shoe, but all flats are cut differently. The show would not prevent me from wearing them. They stay on well as the silicone on the heel holds well. The only con is they are a little thicker which can make the shoe fit a little tighter. That being said they are not flimsy so that your toe could poke through.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Good for ballet flats
customer_reviews.text: Fit fine, will work with ballet flats. Hopefully they will hold up in the wash!
customer_reviews.author: Susan E

customer_reviews.title: too small for size 9.5
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 9.5, and these were so tight on my feet. I wore them for an entire day and my toes were so crunched down. I spent so much time adjusting the socks throughout my day, trying to make it so I had more room in the toes, that they ended up slipping off my heel. I wore them again the next day, and ended up throwing them in the bathroom trash can around noon because my toes hurt so bad. Would return if I could, honestly a waste.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Kept falling off
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea and these do actually "don't" show more than others. However, they still show and MORE importantly they kept slipping off. So all day I was having to reach down and put the heel back in place. If I was in a place I couldn't do that by the time I got to my desk my whole sock was off. It's a great concept but didn't work in practice. :(
customer_reviews.author: Judgirl83

customer_reviews.title: No Slip
customer_reviews.text: These are my new favorite thing!!!! I love wearing my low top converse shoes with no show socks but I've always had to adjust them every thirty minutes or so, even with no slip tabs, but these suck actually stay put!!!! I actually gave up on wearing no show socks thinking I would never find any that work, but then I finally decided to try one more type, and I am floored. I can wear them with my shoes for hours and have absolutely zero problems!!! Definitely will be ordering more! If I could rate these more than 5 stars I would
customer_reviews.author: Emily Reed

customer_reviews.title: Too thick!!  Like regular sneaker socks!
customer_reviews.text: They are way too thick!! I would have to buy shoes a whole size bigger. And that will be fine however come the winter, with pantyhose, then the shoe would be too big. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy Larca Depot

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Oh man...I'm soo bummed! Thought I'd finally found liner socks that would stay on inside a shoe. Tried them on...they seemed to fit perfectly...so I tossed out the packaging. Not even 15 steps of walking outside and the liner slid off and bunched up in my shoe. I can't exchange because I no longer have the packaging. :( Be sure to try these on AND walk around more than a few steps before you commit! I gave 2 stars because they do fit well when not walking and the construction seems fine. It's just the design that doesn't work for me. BTW, I am a US Women's size 8.5-9.
customer_reviews.author: Jan T.

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY THESE!!!
customer_reviews.text: TOTAL RIP OFF. I wear a six 6 and 1/2 shoe. I have tried wearing two different pairs of these so far. I like to wear them because my feet get a bit chilly with the air conditioning on, but a regular sock is more than i need. They have already fallen off 8 times and one is lost somewhere in my bedding. I would never buy them again and really want my money back. Also the sescription states you get 5 pair, but really you get 3 pair. These are worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Mom

customer_reviews.title: DON’T SLIP!
customer_reviews.text: I have struggled with finding true non-slipping no-show liner socks and these are IT!!! They are just right. I am a size 10 and I wear these on a daily basis. They are also perfect for my pointy-toe Rothys and everything else. I have 2 sets because let’s get real, I don’t wash every week. I have even ordered three for friends. Great little work gift for people who wear flats on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Jo

customer_reviews.title: Ouch! It hurt to wear these.
customer_reviews.text: I have very small feet. These seemed to fit, but after an hour or so of wearing them, they were digging into the back of my heel & hurt so bad! I'm not sure if a bigger size would've eliminated that problem or if it's just a design flaw. These are made of cotton, are quite a bit thicker than the liner socks I'm used to, & seem to have an elastic band or something at the top. All I know is I just wasted my money on this; only got one hour of use out of one pair; I'll be donating them... hopefully a small child can use them & find them comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: K. Chappell

customer_reviews.title: No-show but don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: These are no-show but DO NOT stay up. Don't waste your money on these. The silicone on the heel to help keep up the socks do not adhere at all. I end up having to pull them up all day long, 10+ more times a day and I work at a desk.
customer_reviews.author: JCTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother.
customer_reviews.text: Way too small and I only wear a size 8. The will not stay up, either. A total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: C. Petiprin

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars from a picky sock person!
customer_reviews.text: I wear flats, mostly a canvas shoe, every day to work. I cannot wear shoes without socks, but it has been a struggle to find some no-peek socks that don't slip off my heel all day. I'm SUPER happy with these!!! I will be buying more! They are thin enough that they don't feel bulky inside my shoe, they are low enough across my toes that I don't have to readjust them throughout the day, and they have not slipped off my heel AT ALL. I've been wearing these for about two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Nmpollard

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay on
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my summer loafers and I am already over them as they do not stay on your feet for even 5 minutes. I have tried to wear one pair and may still return.
customer_reviews.author: HrhSophia

customer_reviews.title: Don't notice any cotton
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with these. These are just like all the other sock liners that are made of polyester. I decided to buy online to make sure I found liners with a high cotton ratio to help my feet breathe and soak up sweat. These don't I feel cotton is in them at all. My feel get hot in these and my sweaty feet just slide around in polyester like all the other brands they sell at all the store in the sock section. I did find an amazon brand that says 90% cotton so I will keep trying.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Cullen

customer_reviews.title: A little awkward.
customer_reviews.text: I have a size 7, narrow foot. These socks are... interesting. (?) They don’t particularly stay put well, and they aren’t “no show”, when worn inside of shoes like those pictured in my review. They are comfortable to wear without shoes, and they don’t come off. Maybe they would be good for an activity like yoga, or to pair with pajamas. They are of decent quality, in terms of thickness and feel (without shoes).
customer_reviews.author: Meranda J.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but poke out if you have small feet
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. I like that they’re thicker than other liners, hopefully that will prevent holes in the toes like I have in my other liners! My only complaint is I have small (6.5) feet and they go up a little too high on the sides so they poke out of my shoes. Wish they made a smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love these low cut socks! Have tried several other brands over the years. These are more sock like (not thin like you can and will poke your toe through) AND the silicone grip on the inside of the heel! I have tried them out in several pairs of shoes that I have not been able to wear no show socks with before because these stay in place. To me that was a big win. I much prefer these to knee high stockings for wearing slip on shoes through the summer. And the price was excellent. At the box store one pair similar to these is about half of the cost of this 5 pack. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Horrible socks, do not waste money
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! At first I was super excited when I opened the package since they look exactly as advertised, but after I wore them for one day I completely regretted wasting my money on these. They do not stay up—all day long I had to pull them up since they kept slipping off...I ended up getting a huge blister since these socks are worthless and can’t do their job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Other "no show" socks could not be worn with flats or boat shoes but these are perfect! I will be buying more of these for ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! Other "no show" socks could not be worn with flats or boat shoes but these are perfect! I will be buying more of these for the summer!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Weldon

customer_reviews.title: Great no-show socks!
customer_reviews.text: For reference, I am wearing a size 7 flat, however I am more of a size 8. The backs of these (and many other shoes) tend to irritate the back of my ankle after prolonged wear. Finding a good sole is key for me, so a little ankle pain isn't a deal breaker when buying shoes. These socks have helped to form a barrier between the shoes and my skin so that irritation is gone! 10/10 would buy again. So comfy, they don't slip, and they serve their purpose without being seen. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: beccaabee

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: These no-show socks are a very good product, however, they are a little short. Another 1/4" longer and they would feel very comfortable. I wear them with my slip-on dress shoes (1/2" heel) and they stay in place all day and I don't have to rearrange them. There is no seam around or across the toes so they are comfortable to wear all day. This is my second order of these socks. Very good product!
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Best non-slip liner socks that’ll last!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried many different brands before, but this is the only one that lasts a long time and stays in place all day long (I work on my feet 11-12 hrs/day). They seem a little thicker than other cheaply made brands, with other thin ones, the big toe areas usually rips after 1-2 uses, but these are the best, I’ve been using them for several months and they’re still in great shape. I love the added non-slip feature in the back of the heels as well. I got black and beige color mix for different colored shoes. I bought it twice and will purchase again if I need extra.
customer_reviews.author: A neat freak

customer_reviews.title: Nice comfortable fit. Updated...
customer_reviews.text: I have worn these every day since purchasing. They are very soft and comfie. I wear a size 6 shoe and the fit and anti-slip heel is awesome. I’m definitely buying another set. Update as of May 7. Ordered a second set and they slip off my heels. I was looking forward to wearing them but not anymore.
customer_reviews.author: JaeMarie

customer_reviews.title: These are great! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Just the right fit and quality, gonna see how they hold up in the wash. I’ll probably buy more. These are better than the PEDS ones because those were way too big. These are a snug fit, but that’s okay because they’ll stretch out over time, more than likely. Also, these are a good weight, not too thin not too thick so they’ll fit in tight-fitting shoes. I’m leaving them on the cardboard liner to help them keep their shape when I’m not wearing them, also because they can be difficult to fold.
customer_reviews.author: KilgoreTrout34

customer_reviews.title: ... these as they are digging into my feet But good seller and fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: I am keeping them but I have to say I am only a size 5 I don’t know how people with bigger feet actually wear these as they are digging into my feet But good seller and fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: M. Dyer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Small Feet
customer_reviews.text: My biggest problem was finding "no-show" socks that don't actually show anyway, climbing too far up the top of my feet. I wear a women's (US) size 5, and it is near-impossible to find no-show socks that actually fit -- and if they do fit, won't flip off like a slingshot. And then I found these. This is the ticket for those of us with tiny feet, but for those with bigger sizes, there's plenty of fabric left to be stretchy.
customer_reviews.author: Rat Fink

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit, No Slip, Wish Were Lower
customer_reviews.text: I like the fit and material BUT, they are not no-show for most of my shoes. It's not the top or back (which you can finagle a little to hide), it's the sides. I feel they are cut too high on the sides for regular pumps and flats. They show on the sides with every shoe I have, both flat and high-heeled. They are good for low profile walking and running shoes though, especially since they do not slip, and I will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Brigette

customer_reviews.title: No-show, good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Items were packaged nicely. I wear a women's size 10. I have worn these socks with my workout shoes, and canvas sneakers. I have had no slipping at the heel at all. In fact these leave a cuff mark because they are almost tight on my foot, but not uncomfortable. These are true no-show socks, nothing visible on the sides. Cover the toe and heel well. They are like a thick winter "tights" material. No sweating or smell apparent. Have worn all 5 pairs, and they all perform the same! Oh, and no toe holes!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Love!! These work great!!! I bought a loafer style shoe made out of leather so I didn’t want to go bare foot in them and get them all sweaty. Yuck. These work great!!!!! They don’t show at all in my loafers and the socks stayed on because they have a silicone strip on the heel. I was able to walk around and not have the sock slip down my foot. I’ll probably end up buying more because I also have some low cut slip on sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Low cut socks
customer_reviews.text: These low cut liner socks seem to be working for me. I have worn 2 pairs and they haven’t slipped or shown over my shoes. I haven’t washed and then worn, so I don’t know if washing will shrink them. I think they should be fine. I am very happy with my purchase. I’ve tried several brands and all but one slips off my heels. I like that I could buy the 3 different colors in one pack.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you get what you paid for
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 3 pair pack in April. I really like the socks, they are thick and they stay in place when I wear them. The problem is that instead of 6 socks (3 pairs), I only received 5. I would recommend the product but I can't since unfortunately I saw another similar review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The first time I wore these socks one wouldn’t stay on, came off in my shoe and I was at home (nothing strenuous, just walking in the house). I had to take my shoe off, put the sock back on and then it came off second time. I will try another pair of these one more time before I return. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: marcia varel

customer_reviews.title: Definitely No Show
customer_reviews.text: While these definitely do not show with the shoes I have, they slid off my heel within the first few steps. I accidentally wore one of these with one of my Bombas no shows (same color) and I couldn't figure out why one sock kept sliding. Wasn't until I got home that I realized I mixed a Bombas with one of these. As expensive as Bombas are, I invested because they definitely do not slide.
customer_reviews.author: Regina M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice amount of cushion
customer_reviews.text: I have some flats with a nubbly 'foot massaging' insole, which is a nice idea, but the texture is just a little bit too much for my feet. I got these no-show socks hoping they would help, and I'm impressed! They provide a decent amount of cushion without being too thick. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Lexa K.

customer_reviews.title: comfy and really does fit a size 11, great with Croc black ballet flats
customer_reviews.text: These footies are really comfy. They are thicker than I expected, but not too much. I was worried they wouldn't fit my size 11 feet, even though the size range said they would, but my worries were unfounded. They nicely complement my black, dressy-looking, Croc ballet flats, making them even more comfortable than in bare feet by wicking away perspiration that tends to make the Crocs slippery inside.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Morrissey

customer_reviews.title: Not as no-show as I'd hoped
customer_reviews.text: Not as no-show as I'd hoped for. The socks themselves are nice. They're soft. Comfy to wear and I do like the silicone at the heel to help they stay put. However, they're a bit higher than my other socks. They do show in my basic flats. The heel rides up high too. I'll keep these, but will have to wear something else with my flats.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: My favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I have been REALLY struggling with find the perfect no-show socks for my ballet flats, and NOW I've finally found my favorite. I've tried versions from Target, DSW, and Steve Madden, but these are clearly the best. They don't go beyond the toes or heel, so even pretty minimal flats don't show the socks. They have THE BEST grip out of any no-show sock I've had, and they don't lose their stretch (I've been using mine for months now). HIGHLY recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jen B.

customer_reviews.title: These are not no-show
customer_reviews.text: These are so soft and comfy but they are definitely not no-show. They show in nearly every pair of flats I own which defeats the purpose of even having them. They'd probably work better with boat shoes are something along those lines.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: will return
customer_reviews.text: These did not work for me I will be returning. They do not stay on my feet at all. Slipped off my heel after five minutes of wear. Will be returning. Im a size 10 shoe but the reviews were good so I thought I would give them a try. No luck.
customer_reviews.author: vicki smith

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointing
customer_reviews.text: They stayed on the entire day the first time I wore them at Disney World, but after washing they only last about 1/2 hour before they start to flip off my heels.
customer_reviews.author: ScandiGirl

customer_reviews.title: I love these!
customer_reviews.text: I wear these nearly every day when I'm working. I moved from a cool climate to a warm one (okay, HOT), but I need to wear closed toe shoes at work. I dislike going barefoot in my shoes because that starts to stink after a while. These are comfy and I don't even notice I'm wearing them most of the time. I just ordered 2 more packs of them. They are now my official work socks!
customer_reviews.author: Amy H.K.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Like these no sock socks for the cooler weather. I like that look rather than reg socks sometimes so these are perfect and surprisingly keep feet warm enough in the present 40 degree weather at least and would be warm enough inside in winter I think. They have a little rubberized area in the inside heel part that helps to keep them from slipping off like peds of the old days did.
customer_reviews.author: susieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I use these types of socks a lot. I work in the financial industry so flats are my go-to shoe when I'm running late or just want to dress up an outfit. I have very sweaty feet and it has been impossible to find ones that will stay up on my heel through the workday and not keep falling and being obnoxious. I plan on buying more of these! These are the only ones that I have found that will stay up through the day and be just as secure as when I first put them on. I won't buy anything else!
customer_reviews.author: Sdixon611

customer_reviews.title: Socks That Truly Don't Slip Off Your Feet
customer_reviews.text: Much to my amazement, these socks with their little silicone squiggles on the back of your foot, really don't slip off. I'm utterly stunned, and will be purchasing more in the future. I wash them in the machine, but am not putting them in the dryer because I worry that the silicone will melt off or ruin the non-slip. I may be over cautious but I want the socks to last.
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: These stay put!
customer_reviews.text: First time I’ve had no show socks actually stay on. Most I’ve tried slip off if you wear them without shoes and really slip when wearing boots or shoes. As you can see from the photo there is more than just a strip of the sticky stuff. I like the fact there are multiple colors. I am a size 10 and these fit fine. I also like the weight of the fabric it’s not to light or too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: ETSLLC

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to wear with my gazillion loafer shoes. I was worried reading reviews on different socks not staying on, but these socks stay on and are very comfy. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: DEK

customer_reviews.title: These do not show while wearing flats
customer_reviews.text: In all of the images the sock is being worn on the persons right foot, the left foot is barefooted. The socks do not slip off the heel nor do they slip around inside the shoe. The images were taken after an 8 hour shift of standing at work. They are comfortable and just thick enough to last much longer than any other pairs of this type of sock.
customer_reviews.author: Hoodland

customer_reviews.title: Just right!
customer_reviews.text: The thickness is good, not super thin or overly thick and it is very low cut. The little things in the back work great and no allergic reaction. Wish they had it dark brown.
customer_reviews.author: Hollywood South

customer_reviews.title: Do not stay in place on heel or toes
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure how someone with a size 10 foot can complain that these completely cover their toes. I wear an 8.5 and only half my toes are covered most of the time, and the heel constantly slips off. I like the socks when they stay in place, but it's frustrating to have to fix them several times throughout the work day.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bak

customer_reviews.title: Great for most shoes.
customer_reviews.text: They were great for keeping shoes from sticking to feet in the hot southern summer. (No blisters or icky sticky feet sounds yay!) They are comfortable and stay over heel very well. The only issue I have is in some flats, they show a little on the top of my foot towards the toes. I can adjust them but they eventually slip back. It probably wouldn't be an issue for longer feet. I am a size 8 Wide shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shrunk. Size up
customer_reviews.text: These socks were good at first. Nice density (not too thin) with silicone heel. The first was perfect. However two wash later (air dried), they no longer fit as well. Particularly the right foot, every pair slips down. I guess my foot may be longer. I would say size up.
customer_reviews.author: Allisea

customer_reviews.title: low cut socks
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fabric, but was disappointed in the actual liner. i didnt think it was going to come down so low on the toes.. which squeezed the toes together, making it very uncomfortable to wear. I guess i needed a larger size? ..if there was one ? the liner was popping off as i put it on.. didnt stretch as i thought it would
customer_reviews.author: Katherine M. Trinite

customer_reviews.title: Just get them
customer_reviews.text: They’re literally the only no show socks I’ve ever bought that don’t end up below my heel, but are actually no show. I wear a women’s 11, so this is quite a magical find for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Fall right off the ankle :-(
customer_reviews.text: Terrible socks. After 2 minutes, the sock slides off the ankle, thereby exposing my ankle to the shoe and MASSIVE BLISTERS. Went right in the garbage. NOT HAPPY
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Best liner socks out therr
customer_reviews.text: These liner socks are the only kind I will wear anymore. I had other brands that I had bought in the shoes store, but they never stayed on. These stay on all day, even in the evening when I take my shoes off and am just walking around in socks. I wear them 2 or more days a week to work, and I walk a lot at my job. Very comfortable and have held up well after multiple washings
customer_reviews.author: shannon r

customer_reviews.title: Actually stays on your foot!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a women's size 11 shoe so these type of socks normally run small for me. They usually slip off my heel or toe and make life miserable. Not this brand! They have a silicone backing on the heel that not only give you a little extra cushion against the back of your shoe but also hold the sock in place. I am a PreK assistant, on my feet all day, taking lots of steps. These pass the test!
customer_reviews.author: Hope T.

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: My first impression with these socks is that they are fantastic! I am a shoe size 8, and the socks fit like a glove. Most of my socks always slip down my heel and it's super annoying, but with these it is not a problem at all! My feet stay warm when wearing low cut sneakers and is quite breathable. I haven't worn them for very long, so I don't know how long they will last without getting holes, but I don't tend to wear holes in my socks if they're well made with good materials. Really happy I bought these!
customer_reviews.author: Cece789

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit size 10.5
customer_reviews.text: It is listed as fitting up to size 11, but as a size 10.5 the sock kept sliding off and wouldn't really stay on enough for me to take more than a few steps around my room when trying them on. Will be returning. The gel on the heel looked better than what I've seen on other brands' socks, but it didn't help in this situation since the sock wasn't made for larger feet.
customer_reviews.author: PNWAuntie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and they don't slip!
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I have to wear dress shoes most days but I can't wear them without some kind of liner. I used to wear the nylon ones, like pantyhose material. They would rip, run, slide off my heel, and not absorb sweat at all. These are good quality, much thicker than nylon but not so thick that they make the shoes tight. They last, they absorb sweat, and they have a bit of silicone at the heel so they DO NOT SLIP! I'll definitely be buying more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen McArdelle

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic fit!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these!!!! I bought some cheaper hanesbrand previously and they were too high on the top of the foot and slipped off A LOT. These DONT SLIP OFF THE HILL!! They length over the toe is ideal. Definitely better no show!! Will buy again and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: C Mercier

customer_reviews.title: Holds well in place
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid of getting pairs that slip down, but this holds well in place. It's quite absorbent for how thin it is. One slight issue i had though is that the band was a little tight for me, but not annoyingly uncomfortable. Let's see how it goes
customer_reviews.author: saraheyoasuquo

customer_reviews.title: Your feet will ❤️ you! Helps combat SFS (sweaty feet syndrome)
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! Not too tight where they cut off my circulation or leave painful indents due to being too tight. FYI they peek out on the sides/toes in most work flats, so they aren’t totally hidden. But I love wearing them in my Toms or other basic tennies bc they are totally hidden and give that “no socks” look. I like them more than the 4 other brands I’ve tried so, I bought them again!
customer_reviews.author: Expert online shopper!

customer_reviews.title: Can't even walk across my office without them falling down
customer_reviews.text: These aren't the worst non-slip no show socks I have purchased, but they aren't good. They are mostly no show, they are comfortable, but they are absolutely not non-slip. I can probably walk 100 feet before the back slips off my heel and they fall under my foot. I have yet to find any that actually don't fall down, so there fore they get 2 stars for being less awful then some of my other ones. I included a picture to show how much they show with my flats.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Not for small feet
customer_reviews.text: I size at a 6.5 but sometimes wear 7 in US women's and these just don't fit well. I'm sure they work fine for bigger feet but even on my flats with the most coverage you can see a lot of these poking up along the sides. The heels are very baggy unless I pull them up a lot in the back but then the back part sits really high and looks really dorky.
customer_reviews.author: Christi M

customer_reviews.title: Still peel off the heal
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to wrap up the insoles in my shoes. It was a hack I saw. That didn't work because the elastic turns up the insole. So I wore them normally and they peeled off of my heels when I walked. Wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2 Boys

customer_reviews.title: Air dry!
customer_reviews.text: Work great in my Keen sandals. Just make sure when putting them on that you put the silicone grippy part at the heel! I have had no problems with slipping and I wear them for miles at a time. I also air-dry so that the heat from the dryer does not damage the heel grip or the socks great stretch. I love mine and will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma’s Goodies

customer_reviews.title: No good with ballerina shoes.
customer_reviews.text: These socks show if you wear them with ballerina shoes. I'll wear them with my Keds, but I'll have to buy a different brand for my ballerina shoes and heels.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No peekaboo or slippage
customer_reviews.text: I wanted socks that would protect and not slip under my flats. These. Are. Perfect. Perfect size, perfect fit, perfect colors, and NO SLIPPAGE. These are great and you gotta love the little bits of rubber to keep them in place. Comfortable and you dont see them. All that I needed.
customer_reviews.author: MELISSA

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality socks. Very comfortable with good silicone grips on the inner heels to prevent slipping, which work well. They are a little big for me, but I’m hoping they shrink a bit after several washings (I am a size 6.5) That said, they hide pretty well in my ballet flats with just a little peeping out.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy from Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: The socks feel wonderful right out of the pack. They are also very comfortable once you put them on. Unfortunately, they do not hold up. These socks developed holes in the toe region after the first time that I wore them. This happened in both socks that I wore that day. I would not recommend these socks.
customer_reviews.author: Krispy23C

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Thick enough where they will last but thin enough where they don't make my shoe too tight. They really do NOT slip off the heel. Very comfortable. Only downside is they do show in some of my flats. It comes up higher on the side of my foot than what is pictured. I suppose if someone had a bigger foot that would not be an issue. Overall exceeded expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Coopergrl

customer_reviews.title: Rubber spots helps socks not fall off your foot!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Pair really well with my amazon basics ballet flats. (Slightly show on the sides for me so you may want to pick a color close to your skin or the shoe) love the little rubbery spot in the back of the heal so they dont slip off when walking. My old no show socks always fell off my heal into my shoe and felt pointless.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Best so Far!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I've gone through several different types of these everyday no-show peds, and these are the only ones to stand up to daily use. The fiber is sturdy, lets your feet breath, and is very comfortable. I've had no slippage on the ankle or toes, and the sock is hidden 99% of the time. I will definitely be buying these again unless something changes!
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Very Thick and Definitely Show
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy fabric and doesn't work at all with my kitten heels. There is no way I could get it to not show, especially on the back heel. I then tried it with a pair of my dress loafers with ties. The fabric still came up the back. I would prefer much thinner fabric, closer to a nylon.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than Skechers brand
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! In fact it is better quality than the Skechers brand I originally had. I purchased a pair a Skechers shoes that are form fitted and you can only wear this type of sock. I originally purchased Skechers brand of sock. After two to three washed the sock stretched to the point of not being able to wear them anymore. So I purchased these. They are a better fit and the material is sturdy yet thin. I’m impressed
customer_reviews.author: Ariel B.

customer_reviews.title: Don't stay on
customer_reviews.text: They fit well and don't show in my slip on shoes, but they fall down all the time! If I'm wearing them when I go grocery shopping they will fall off at least 4 times, I give up pulling them back up and just deal with walking on them crumpled up in my shoe. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: They stay put!
customer_reviews.text: They stay put! That’s for sure. I’m a size ten and on one foot, my second toe is a bit longer and for that reason the sock on that foot seems a bit short. But I’ll wear them, in hopes it’ll stretch. But they sure don’t slip off!
customer_reviews.author: Sher

customer_reviews.title: Not good for larger feet
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 9.5. I bought these to wear with my slip on Vans and Converse Shorelines. They were great straight out of the package. But...washed them once and they shrink and will not stay on my feet again. Women with smaller or more average size feet may have better luck. If they had continued to fit after washing, would have given a 5 star review.
customer_reviews.author: M. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I love to wear these socks with my Bob's. They are comfortable and the rubber grip on the back of the heel helps it stay in place of I'm out on a walk. I'm so happy I bought the large pack since I'm always losing one side in the wash. I wear a size 6.5 shoe and it works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: jenn

customer_reviews.title: Overall, a good liner sock.
customer_reviews.text: Good liner socks. Initially I was bothered by the fact that about 15-20% is polyester (not only cotton, as they described), since polyester is not a healthy layer around any body surface. (It causes intense perspiration, by lack of air flow.) Other than this, they fit well and will not move around inside the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: PenName

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical if these would work. I wore a pair for the first time for a day of walking and shopping and they held up great! No slippage, my feet weren't too hot (which is a huge problem for me.) I am pleasantly surprised and very happy with these socks.
customer_reviews.author: lgauthier

customer_reviews.title: Great for work and keeping your feet from stinking!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter who needed socks in her work shoes. They keep her feet dry and since she is on her feet al lday help with the stink that could be a problem when feet are contained all day! They fit in her dress shoes great and do not show at all. They are thin and not bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff-n-Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. I was worried they'd be cheaply made for the price but they're not. They have a little bit of grip on the inside so they don't slide off your feet which I thought was great. I've bought socks like these from other people in the past and they always seemed to slip off over time.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a sealed package. These are the first ultra low cut socks I have had that truly do not show nor do they move because of the rubber lining in the back. They are comfortable to wear all day with heels, ballerina flats and low cut boots. Will definitely be purchasing more
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani Jones

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and Stay in place!
customer_reviews.text: I wear no show socks almost daily at work with my flats and so far these are my favorite of all that I've found! They are thicker material than others and have more of the non slip grip on the inside than any other brand I've tried. Most other socks I'm constantly fixing through the day but not these! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great liner socks!
customer_reviews.text: I love these liner socks. I've been searching for these for a long, long time and finally came across the right ones for me. I work in an office and sometimes where nice loafers or shoes that you can't really wear socks with. I needed a no show sock and this one is perfect! They actually stay on all day without slipping off and they help prevent foot odor. Love, love, love these!!! Recommended 100%
customer_reviews.author: LongoA

customer_reviews.title: Finally something for big feet
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried a lot of different brands of these types of socks but many of them are too small for my feet. They constantly slip off because I think they are being pulled too tight. These are much better. They are roomy enough to accommodate my 9.5 size feet. I ordered two packs after trying out the first set.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa8631

customer_reviews.title: Socks that stay put
customer_reviews.text: I’m women's US 8.5-9 and they fit perfectly. It has some silicone grips inside for the back of your ankle AND THEY ACTUALLY WORK!! Not once have I had to readjust or pull them back up like I do with most no show socks. Super comfortable and I plan on purchasing more!
customer_reviews.author: Parker

customer_reviews.title: Truly No-Show!
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent! I don’t know how I lived wearing bare feet in my flats. These are truly no-show in my ballet flats. They are stretchy and soft, and feel like nice quality. They are very thin, but I prefer it that way. They don’t slip! 1 star off because the elastic band cuts into my ankle and gets a little painful.
customer_reviews.author: drebear917Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Shrink to unusable size
customer_reviews.text: At first these were great. I love the rubber on the back of the sock to help it stick to my foot. After one washing, these shrunk to where they are slipping off my feet every two seconds. It's not even worth putting them on. I wear a size 12 women's and maybe these are better for smaller feet. I regret buying them.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy in Training

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic socks
customer_reviews.text: These socks are fantastic! The material is nice and thick, no loose strings, and they absorb sweat well. They are good to wear with dress shoes and sneakers. There is a part on the heel of the sock to make sure that they do not slip, and it works wonders. I haven’t had my socks slip out of place at all, and I wear them every day for work. I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Smith

customer_reviews.title: These are pretty great.
customer_reviews.text: Update! Originally I wrote that these no-shows squeeze my toenails too much to be comfortable for more than an hour or two. (Shoe size US women’s 8.) However! They just needed some breaking in. Now I’m in love. I’ve gone and bought a pair of slip-on Vans, wore these no-shows under them at work all day, and everything went well. Huzzah!
customer_reviews.author: Star-Struck Stella

customer_reviews.title: They don’t slip off at all!
customer_reviews.text: The best no show socks ever!!! The grip on the back is legit, I was skeptical, however after working a full shift, 9hrs on my feet, in my work Timberland clogs, they have not slipped once!! I will re buy this product every time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Show slight but stay in place
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and most importantly they STAY IN PLACE! They show some with Mary Janes, but not with loafers or slip on tennis shoes. I plan on purchasing more. I can’t stand socks that slip or are too tight, but these fit and don’t slide. For reference I wear sshoe size 8.
customer_reviews.author: emily m.

customer_reviews.title: great sock
customer_reviews.text: So soft. I walked all over Paris with these on. They stay on great with the correct shoes. I wore a pair of flats that the heal would slip and pull off the back of the sock. I blame it all on the shoes. All other shoes they worked great. The fit: they covered just my toes and back to my heal. Nothing showed unless I didn't get them on correctly. I typically wear a size 7 usa shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

product_meta.title: Ultra Low Cut Liner Socks Women No Show Non Slip Hidden Invisible for Flats Boat Summer
feature_bullets: EXTREMELY low cut no show liner socks with basic colors.They're super suitable for variety of lady's shoes,like flats,pumps,high-heel shoes,ballerian,Loafers or Sneakers
MADE FROM PREMIUM COTTON: Very comfortable to wear. Take good care of your feet
SILICONE GRIPPERS on the heel to keep liners stay in place on your feet
Main material:80% Cotton.Do well in elasticity,durable and good ability to soak up sweat
One size fits 6-11(US).It's stretchy enough to fit most ladies
